price: Bazanavuga bati “Ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye ni ibya Allah, We watumaze agahinda. Rwose Nyagasani wacu ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Ushima (ibikorwa by’abagaragu be).”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqālū al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī adhhaba ʿannā al-ḥazana inna rabbanā laghafūrun shakūrun
